content: That's really helpful, thank you. Since I'm still in the planning stages, I'm also thinking about how to manage the property once it's completed. My siblings and I cleared out some of the overgrowth and inspected the old farmhouse last month, and we're all excited about the potential. But we also know that managing a vacation rental can be a lot of work. Do you have any advice on how to handle things like bookings, maintenance, and guest services?
